item.title: RC4 Encryption, Decryption, please :'[
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

SUP YO.

Oke, I have to get this fast. Im working on a project and I need to be able to have a java program and a javascript shit thing be able to use RC4 encryption and decryption. Now, I found a rc4 encryptor in java, and one in javascript, but they return different things!!! HELP PLEASE :[

In the end, I made my own encryption and it didn’t work here it is

[code]public boolean isEven(int n)
{
return (n % 2 == 0);
}
public int toInt(boolean b)
{
if(b) return 1;
else return 0;
}
public int buildChar(String k)
{
int exit = 0;

	for(int i = 0; i < k.length(); i++)
	{
		//exit = exit + k.charAt(i);
		exit = exit + toInt(isEven(k.charAt(i)));
	}
	
	return exit;
}
public String buildString(char[] letters)
{
	String exit = ""; 
	
	for(int i = 0; i < letters.length; i++)
	{
		exit = exit + letters[i];
	}
	
	return exit;
}
public String decrypt1(String t, String k)
{
	int diff = buildChar(k);
	char[] real = new char[t.length()];
	
	for(int i = 0; i < t.length(); i++)
	{
		char c = t.charAt(i);
		
		if(isEven(c))
		{
			real[i] = (char) (c << diff);
		}
		else
		{
			real[i] = (char) (c >> diff);
		}
	}
	
	return buildString(real);
}
public String encrypt1(String t, String k)
{
	int diff = buildChar(k);
	char[] mixed = new char[t.length()];

	for(int i = 0; i < t.length(); i++)
	{
		if(isEven(t.charAt(i)))
		{
			mixed[i] = (char) (t.charAt(i) >> diff);
		}
		else
		{
			mixed[i] = (char) (t.charAt(i) << diff);
		}
	}
	
	return buildString(mixed);
}
[/code]

That’s not the main thing though, make rs4 encryptor in java and javascript for a poor diary cop servicer?

EDIT: Or you can just fix0r my current encryption method and tell me whats wrong, so I can port it to jS
